section.para: The wagon-gitsite is an implementation of Wagon provider for deploying site documentation to GitHub as site documentation, using GitHub's pages system.

Essentially, if you have a top-level branch in your project called "gh-pages", which you must create yourself before using this wagon, you can deploy your site documentation to that branch and it will be available via the URL
